OnConnect.AddIRCMessage: !ANNOUNCEMENT!
*** CHANNEL function initialized: ## k_rmt_BACKUPOVERRIDE.bat ##
*** CHANNEL mode set: +b (ban) for user @Coel
*** @Coel has been kicked by CHANNEL
*** User @Kaguya has been added by CHANNEL
*** User @D3f4ult has been added by CHANNEL
Ok, we're back.
@D3f4ult - you here? Looks like Coel was trying to shut us down.
Yeah, I'm here. She took down my main gateway. On a burner laptop now, but it'll take me a while to get set up again.
Damn... I'll help set you back up in a minute.
There are some pressing matters to get to first.
You got it. Let me know if you need my help.
Ok...
It's down. It's over.
@#PLAYERNAME# , @D3f4ult - good work. Thankyou for doing this.
@D3f4ult , I wish you'd waited for Coel and I to talk this over before rushing in like that. She's not an asset we can replace. Ever.
@#PLAYERNAME# thanks for your understanding. You've made the right choice. I'm going to assume that the choice was intentional, and speak no more of it.
What about that second plane? With the reports...
I.. think we can leave it.
I know it's a risk.. I just don't think this one outweighs the cost I know we'd have to pay to make sure.
It's a lot to process. I'm not sure I'm thinking my clearest. What do you think?
Yeah.. Leave it. We've done our job.
Ok. Agreed.
For now then, I think we should disband.
Especially with Coel gone rogue, it's not safe working together for a while.
Yeah..
I have your contact details - when things have cooled down, I'll be in touch.
The following server will remove your trackers. Consider anything you find on their your own.
It's been a pleasure working with both of you. Thankyou for your help.
See you round Kaguya, #PLAYERNAME#
Stay safe. But not too safe ;)
!ATTACHMENT:link#%#Kaguya_Projects#%#54.183.231.34
